title: Who thinks a new ultimate skin is needed?
body: A new ultimate skin is needed in my opinion... Complete the poll below to state your opinion.

replies.body: There so many high rated champions out there are favored by players, i think by having more ultimate skin is a good idea.

Its not NEEDED it doesn't serve any tactical purpose but i would like to have one nonetheless 
but the question says 'Needed' so I'm gunna vote no.

plus the game has been going for 6 years and there are 2 ultimate skins, that adds up to NOT getting 1 per year so i dunno why ppl think they are being cheated for not getting one this year?

Skins are not for any realistic tactical purpose anyway.

Considering the rate of which new champions are made, ultimate skin should be more common.

may be not once a year but at least once every two years if not more, i can not predict the lifespan of League, but there should be at least 10 by the end. right now, this seems rather unlikely

They should do an ultimate skin for swain, imagine when he kills a minion? imagine his r transformation, his e burn lasts for days, similar to his q, and his w is aoe root so they could do something cool there.
